issue.errorLine1: <string name="appearance_description">Adjust the app to your liking</string>
<string name="fast_seek_description">Seek to nearest key frame instead of exact one.</string>

<string name="permission_info">The Next Player app needs \"%1$s\" permission to access and play media. Without it, media access and playback won\'t work. To use the app fully, grant the permission.</string>

<string name="permission_settings">The Next Player app needs \"%1$s\" permission to access and play media. Without it, media access and playback won\'t work. To use the app fully, grant the permission from settings since it was permanently denied.</string>
<string name="autoplay_settings_description">Automatically play the next video in the current folder</string>
<string name="pip_settings_description">Automatically switch to miniature player when tapping Home Button</string>
<string name="remember_selections_description">Remember selections for each file like audio track, subtitle track, etc</string>
<string name="resume_description">Select whether to resume played videos from the point where you stopped</string>
<string name="seek_gesture_description">Swipe horizontally to seek forwards or backwards</string>
<string name="swipe_gesture_description">Swipe vertically to adjust the brightness and volume</string>
<string name="dynamic_theme_description">Apply colors from system wallpaper to the application theme</string>
<string name="preferred_audio_lang_description">Language of the audio track you want to use by default</string>
<string name="preferred_subtitle_lang_description">Language of the subtitle track you want to use by default</string>
<string name="force_rescan_storage_desc">Caution: Initiating a full storage rescan may cause increased resource usage on your device</string>
<string name="manage_folders_desc">Select folders to be excluded in the media library</string>
<string name="embedded_styles_desc">Apply the embedded styles that are present in subtitle files, such as ASS and so on</string>
<string name="delete_file">The following file will be deleted permanently</string>
<string name="delete_folder">All video files in the following folder will be deleted permanently.</string>
<string name="long_press_gesture_desc">Long press to play at %.1fx speed</string>
<string name="high_contrast_dark_theme_desc">Use pure black background for dark theme</string>
<string name="pause_on_headset_disconnect_desc">Pause playback when headset disconnected from the device</string>
<string name="system_volume_panel_desc">Show system volume panel while adjusting volume with headset on</string>
<string name="system_caption_style_desc">Click to open system captioning preferences</string>
<string name="require_audio_focus_desc">Pause other players while this player is playing videos, and vice versa.</string>
<string name="no_subtitle_tracks_found">Subtitle tracks for this video are either unavailable or not supported.</string>
<string name="no_audio_tracks_found">Audio tracks for this video are either unavailable or not supported.</string>
<string name="floating_play_button_desc">Show floating button to play last played media.</string>
<string name="mark_last_played_media_desc">Mark last played media in home and in each folder</string>
<string name="enable_pip_from_settings">Picture-in-Picture is disabled. Enable it in Settings to use this feature.</string>
<string name="background_play_description">Play in background when tapped on home or screen is locked.</string>

issue.message: "media" is a common misspelling; did you mean "medier"?
issue.errorLine1: <string name="permission_info">Innvilg Next-avspillerprogrammet «%1$s»tilgang for å spille media.</string>

issue.message: "media" is a common misspelling; did you mean "medier"?
issue.errorLine1: <string name="permission_settings">Innvilg Next-avspillerprogrammet «%1$s»tilgang (fra innstillingene siden dette ble nektet tidligere) for å spille media.</string>

issue.message: Very long vector path (980 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
Very long vector path (800 characters), which is bad for performance. Considering reducing precision, removing minor details or rasterizing vector.
